name: Red Adventure
description:
A girl in a red hood explores the unprecedented beauty of a mysterious world, armed with a bow and fighting off annoying slugs that have taken over this wonderful world and will not allow the heroine to calmly explore the world and get out of it.

Red Adventure - A platformer with some elements of Metroidvania, where the player has to explore a completely open world, collecting various improvements for his player, which will help to pass impassable places and climb into unique levels.

Features of the game:
- Visual style
- Old TV Effect
- Elements of Metroidvania
- Complexity
